topics.body:
"@hype":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/557cfc9b6368727fba001513#post_557cfc9b6368727fba001513
[bq="hype"]"@Shadow the Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/557cfb546368727fba0012e1#post_557cfb546368727fba0012e1
[spoiler]also you know a bear is a big hairy gay guy right[/spoiler][/bq]
No, I thought a bear was mammal animal species that lives mostly in forests and eats fish to get fat so it could survive the winter.
I didn't know that.
Stupid school, it lied to me about bears all the time

-Shady
